features: POWERFUL PROTEIN INFUSION: Visibly heal signs of hair damage with Nexxus Keraphix Shampoo for Damaged Hair. The first step of Nexxus’ keratin hair treatment that brings the salon experience home
SMOOTHING KERATIN SHAMPOO reaches into the hair fiber to help repair from within. Continued use enables the keratin to increase hair’s resilience, leaving you with silky and luminous hair
KERATIN TREATMENT INFUSED WITH PROTEINFUSION: Inspired by Nexxus New York City salon, Nexxus shampoo with Keratin Protein and Black Rice is your new weapon to heal signs of damaged hair
SALON-CRAFTED HAIR CARE: Take the first step to rejuvenated hair with our hair repair treatment for damaged hair. Nexxus Shampoo helps replenish and repair hair, leaving it revitalized and cleansed
THE SCIENCE OF PROTEIN: Nexxus knows hair structure consists of up to 90% protein, so Nexxus scientists use leading-edge research called Proteomics to create its revitalizing hair treatment
NEXXUS HAIR CARE PRODUCTS: Looking for the best shampoo and conditioner for hair repair? Nexxus Keraphix line of keratin shampoo and conditioner, plus our hair mask, restores your hair after one use.
body.description: Get the New York City salon experience at home with Nexxus Keraphix Shampoo for Damaged Hair, the first step to a powerful protein-infused keratin treatment that visibly heals signs of severe hair damage after just one use. Clinically proven to deliver internal repair to severely damaged hair from the very first use, Nexxus shampoo helps heal rough and brittle hair. The concentrated formula of this hair treatment for damaged hair features our highest level of proteins containing Keratin, Collagen, and Elastin. Nexxus combines black rice with Keratin Protein and other essential nutrients to create clinically proven healthy-looking hair. Salon-crafted with our exclusive PROTEINFUSION blend, it’s part of a unique 4-step process. When complete, signs of surface damage are healed, and hair is smooth, strong and healthy-looking. It’s safe and formulated for color and chemically treated hair. At Nexxus, we believe helping hair return to its optimal state means treating it with protein at high levels. Nexxus scientists set out to find inspiration from precious ingredients that could help seal severely damaged hair. The Nexxus Keraphix Healing System for Severely Damaged Hair heals visible signs of severe hair damage. Along with Nexxus keratin shampoo, try our deep conditioner for damaged hair, and add a gel treatment or revitalizing hair mask. We’ve created possibly our best hair mask: Keraphix Hair Masque for Damaged Hair—our favorite deep conditioning hair treatment. A leader in salon-quality hair products, Nexxus uses learnings from science and nature. We know that hair is made of almost 90% proteins, which is why we use advanced scientific methods to identify the protein needs of each hair type and create customized formulas with proteins to bring your hair back to life.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Nexxus Keraphix Shampoo is the first step to help heal visible signs of severe hair damage. After one use, hair is stronger and visibly healthy when used with the full Keraphix system.

The Science Bleaching, chemical processing, and rigorous heat styling can severely damage hair both inside and out. Through advanced protein science, Nexxus’ strengthening keratin formula reaches into the hair fiber, repairing it from within The Ingredients We discovered that Glutamic acid is a key amino acid lost when hair is damaged. From this, Keraphix features a ProteinFusion blend with keratin protein and glutamic acid rich black rice to bring hair back to life The Results Nexxus delivers salon quality results with our Keraphix collection that is clinically proven to repair internal hair damage, leaving hair repaired, revitalized, and visibly healthier

Nexxus Keraphix Damage Healing Conditioner, 33.8 oz Nexxus Keraphix Damage Healing Treatment Masque, 1.5 oz Nexxus Keraphix Damage Repair Treatment Cream, 6 oz Main Benefit Nexxus Keraphix Damage Healing Conditioner reaches into the hair fiber to help repair from within and deliver a smooth, conditioned feel. This deep-conditioning treatment envelopes the hair surface with an ultra-fine firm to restore the protective barrier and heal visible signs of severe hair damage. This Damage Repair Treatment Cream features an exclusive re-bonding technology to repair severely damaged hair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars An Absolute Game-changer for Damaged Hair!
reviews.reviewText: I recently stumbled upon the Nexxus Keraphix Shampoo with ProteinFusion for Damaged Hair, and let me tell you, it has been nothing short of amazing! I've been using it for a while now, and I couldn't be happier with the results.First and foremost, the price is an absolute steal for the quality you're getting. This 33.8 oz bottle is a generous size that will last you a long time, making it even more budget-friendly. Trust me, you won't find a better deal!Now, let's talk about the magical transformation it has brought to my hair. My locks were damaged, lifeless, and desperately in need of some love. But since I started using this shampoo, my hair has been thriving! The Keratin Protein and Black Rice in the formula work wonders to repair and strengthen even the most damaged strands. I can feel the difference with each wash!But that's not all. The scent of this shampoo is simply divine! It leaves my hair smelling fresh and delightful all day long. It's a small touch, but it adds to the overall experience and makes me feel confident and rejuvenated.Oh, and did I mention that it's silicone-free? That's right! No more worrying about product build-up or weighing down your hair. This shampoo keeps your hair feeling light, bouncy, and full of life.In conclusion, I can't recommend the Nexxus Keraphix Shampoo with ProteinFusion enough. It's a true game-changer for damaged hair, offering fantastic results at an unbeatable price. Your hair will thank you for this luxurious treat, and you'll be left with a fabulous mane that smells absolutely incredible. Trust me, you won't be disappointed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Must Have for Damaged Hair!
reviews.reviewText: Highly recommend this if you have damaged hair from either bleaching or just over processing your hair. This helps keep my blonde hair from breaking, made it more manageable, and smooths it out so it doesn't look so damaged. I also bought the conditioner, in which I highly recommend buying as well. This has protein in it which is perfect for damaged hair. Just keep in mind products like these are like a band-aid. Once hair is severely damaged and/or dead, you can't actually revive it. They are meant to help your hair until you're able to cut it off.I saw some people complain about the scent, it does have a perfume smell but it didn't bother me. Makes me hair smell really good!! And it lasts!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars WOW! I am impressed!
reviews.reviewText: I love, love, LOVE this shampoo!! I'd been looking for a Keratin shampoo and came across this brand on Amazon. It was a great price and received a lot of good reviews. So I took a chance and bought it. WOW! I'm not easily impressed, but after one shampoo my hair was noticeably softer and bouncier. After the 2nd time I used it, it was even better. My hair is very fine (but I have a lot of it) and not damaged. It has a mind of its own, especially in this Florida summer humidity, but this shampoo has helped make it more manageable. I really am truly impressed on how wonderful my hair feels. So much so, I bought 2 more and they just happened to be even more less expensive than the first time I purchased the shampoo! Yay! I just ordered the conditioner and am waiting to see how it does.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very heavy texture. Others add too much water. The only problem is it has sulfate!. Not for keratin hair. Is great for daily use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells as good as it conditions
reviews.reviewText: Smells so good and my hair is thicker for being conditioned and healed. Love this.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this shampoo
reviews.reviewText: It lathers great and makes washing my hair easy. My hair feels so soft when dry.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nexxus Keraphix Shampoo With ProteinFusion
reviews.reviewText: You can’t go wrong with Nexxus. This is one of their best. I’ve purchased several times.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I cant get the pump unhooked to be able to pump it so I have to open the lid. Shampoo feels nice lathering up but I can't seam to ever get it out of my hair completely. It seems to almost leave a residue? I prefer biolage. But it smells good.
Me encanta. El mejor shampoo de mi historia. Rinde demasiado. Vale cada peso. Recomendadisimo.

Je suis tres satisfaite de celui la j'ai deja essayer d'autre shampoing de nexxus mais la keraphix est mon préféré je le recommande j'ai des cheveux crépu permanente et tres fragile ça marche tres bien pour moi

Me and my family is using this shampoo from last 2 years. It’s seems the product they have delivered is expired or duplicate. Shampoo has no foam at all. Please be careful this seller is distributing duplicate or out dated products.
Es lo que esperaba, es buen producto.
